column6: "SHOCK AND AWE, PART 5: PAST IS PROLOG" There is one villain who can make Moon Knight look sane: The Scarecrow.  This unhinged lunatic has taken to the streets.  Now Moon Knight must face the Scarecrow and his minions of madness under a black sky filled with crows in this final obstacle keeping him from his true nemesis: Bushman. Parental Advisory ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Gregg Hurwitz | penciller:Jerome Opena | penciller:Leinil Francis Yu
